name: Marketplace URL field cannot store empty string

customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P3 - Deep Functions (Do extensive scenarios work?)

inline.description:
Marketplace URL field cannot store empty string
————————————————————————————
1. Remove the value in the URL text field.
2. With the URL field empty, click “Save” at the bottom of the page
inline.expectedResult: • The empty string value is not saved and an error message is displayed that an empty URL is not accepted.

customFields.Related ticket(s): (Unscheduled) Marketplace URL accepts empty string — MM-24941

inline.description:
1. Set Marketplace URL to an empty string char (space)
  2. Click "Save"
inline.expectedResult: • Save button is disabled and an error message tells user that the URL cannot be an empty string.

customFields.Related ticket(s): • (Duplicate) Marketplace URL can be set to empty string character — MM-25847
